trips.name: Taj Mahal
trips.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the Seven Wonders of the World.

trips.name: Jaipur - Hawa Mahal
trips.description: A magnificent palace known for its unique honeycomb architecture.

trips.name: Mysore Palace
trips.description: A grand palace famous for its Indo-Saracenic architecture and royal heritage.

trips.name: Varanasi Ghats
trips.description: Spiritual center of India, known for its sacred Ganges river and ancient temples.

trips.name: Red Fort
trips.description: A historic fort in Delhi, an important symbol of India's independence.

trips.name: India Gate
trips.description: A war memorial dedicated to Indian soldiers of World War I.

trips.name: Golden Temple
trips.description: The holiest Sikh Gurudwara, known for its stunning golden architecture.

trips.name: Rann of Kutch
trips.description: A vast white salt desert famous for the Rann Utsav festival.

trips.name: Backwaters of Kerala
trips.description: A scenic network of lakes, rivers, and canals, perfect for houseboat cruises.
